title: Enna Saththam Indha Neram Lyrics Punnagai Mannan
stanzas:
enna satham indha neram
uyirin oliyaa
enna satham indha neram
nadhiyin oliya

kizhigal mutham tharuthaa
athanaal satham varuthaa
adada aa..

enna satham indha neram
uyirin oliyaa
enna satham indha neram
nadhiyin oliya

kannathil muthathin eeram
adhu kaayavillaiye
kangalil yen andha kanneer
adhu yaarale.

kanniyin kaluthai paarthal
manamaagavillaiye
kadhalan madiyil poothaal
oru poo pole.

mannavane un vizhiyaal
pen vizhiyai moodu.
aatharavaai sainthuvittaal
aariraaro paadu.

aariraro ivar yaar yevaro
bathil solvaar yaaro.

koonthalil nulaindha
kaigal oru kolam podutho.
thannilai marandha penmai
athai thaangaatho.

udhattil thudikkum vaarthai
adhu ularnthu ponatho.
ullangal thudikkkum osai
isai aagaatho.

mangai ival vaai thiranthaal
malligai poo vaasam.
kodai ellaam pen peyarai
ucharithe pesum.

yaar ivargal
iru poonguyilgal
ilam kadhal maanagal.

enna satham indha neram
uyirin oliyaa
enna satham indha neram
nadhiyin oliya
